QuestData.Title: Bombs Away: Windshear Mine!
QuestData.Description: Ve have discovered ze vhereabouts of ze gigantic goblin bomb zat you discovered at Silvervind Refuge.$B$BYou remember Boog? Ze gnome you rescued from ze orcish vagon of agony? Vell, he and Minx have tracked ze bomb down to Windshear Mine. Go zhere immediately, $n! Zey'll be expecting you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Boog the "Gear Whisperer" at Windshear Mine in Stonetalon Mountains.
QuestData.RewardText: Good to see you again, $n. Thanks for the rescue in Ashenvale. Damn shame about all the gnomes we lost.$B$BYou ready to get down to business?$B$B<Boog points to "The Bomb.">
